components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incident_updates.body: Short-code payments are now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: TWILIO PLATFORM - Billing

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue causing the duplicate charges and continue working to deploy a fix. Current workaround is running our integration tests after which we will deploy to production. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: TWILIO PLATFORM - Billing

scheduled_maintenances.name: TaskRouter Scheduled Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Maintenance Details: We will be performing a brief TaskRouter database update in the US1 region, specifically removing a non-essential component from our system. This update is expected to be completed in less than a second and should not affect your service.

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the systems performance during and after the update to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Contingency Plan: In the unlikely event of any issues, we are prepared to revert the changes immediately. Should a rollback be necessary, there may be a short downtime of approximately 2 minutes.

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 06 November 2024 at 12:00 PST until 27 November 2024 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

06 November 2024 at 12:00 PST until 06 November 2024 at 16:00 PST
11 November 2024 at 12:00 PST until 11 November 2024 at 16:00 PST
13 November 2024 at 12:00 PST until 13 November 2024 at 16:00 PST

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our carrier partner AT&T United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 November 2024 at 21:00 PST until 11 November 2024 at 21:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for AT&T United States customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
